ingredients: 1  egg white,   +   1/4 cup confectioners' sugar, 1 cup heavy cream, 1 teaspoon sherry wine or Marsala, 1 teaspoon almond extract, 1 cup almond macaroon crumbs,   +   1/2 cup ground almonds, 6  red maraschino cherries, chopped, 6  green maraschino cherries, chopped,   +   1/4 cup slivered almonds, 4  maraschino cherries, halved for garnish
nutrition: Total Fat 19g 24%, Saturated Fat 7g 37%, Cholesterol 41mg 14%, Sodium 26mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 18g 7%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 13g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 0mg 1%, Calcium 54mg 4%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 137mg 3%
